verses.name: Exodus 26:16
verses.text: Ten cubits shall be the length of a board, and a cubit and a half shall be the breadth of one board.

verses.name: Exodus 26:17
verses.text: Two tenons shall there be in one board, set in order one against another: thus shalt thou make for all the boards of the tabernacle.

verses.name: Exodus 26:18
verses.text: And thou shalt make the boards for the tabernacle, twenty boards on the south side southward.

verses.name: Exodus 26:19
verses.text: And thou shalt make forty sockets of silver under the twenty boards; two sockets under one board for his two tenons, and two sockets under another board for his two tenons.
